_comment1: The first field WINTENDO is the n1mm station name, change this for your local info
_comment2: Also OTHER_STATION# for different local n1mm stations
_comment3: Each station has a <msn> that means MQTT StationName
_comment4: The msn value <DIG,VCE,CW, etc> will be displayed on the i2c display
_comment5: The msn value can only be 3 characters to line up correctly
_comment6: The value of <disp_pos> is where it will show up on the i2c display
_comment7: <disp_pos> keeps that station in the same spot of the display always
